text: The Executive Officer shall be responsible for --
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 11-1744.

1973 Ed., § 11-1744.

DC CODE § 11-1744

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: collecting and compiling statistical information with respect to the volume and disposition of the work of the courts and the personnel of the courts;
printing and the distribution of court rules;
keeping the courts advised of pending legislative and executive actions relating to the courts;
serving as the public information officer of the courts; and
performing such other duties as may be assigned to the Executive Officer by the Joint Committee and the chief judges in their respective courts.

title.text: Organization and Jurisdiction of the Courts. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Administration of District of Columbia Courts. (Refs & Annos)
